alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 10:13PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN COLUMBIANA... NORTHERN BEAVER AND SOUTHERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM EDT... At 1012 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms extending from near Campbell to near Calcutta. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Beaver Falls, Monaca, East Palestine, Economy, Ellwood City, New Brighton, Beaver, Calcutta, Rochester, Ohioville, Oakwood, Industry, New Castle Northwest, New Waterford, Patterson Township, Conway, Big Beaver, Freedom, and New Beaver. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 22. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 13 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
